flawed_nl_solution:
She has 240 minutes to write because 4 x 60 = <<4*60=240>>240
She will write 2400 words because 240 x 10 = <<240*10=2400>>2400
She will earn $240 for the words because 2400 x 0.1 = <<2400*0.1=240>>240
She will earn $180 from the articles because 3 x 60 = <<3*60=180>>180
She will earn $424 in total because 240 + 180 = <<240+180=424>>424
She will average $106 an hour because 424 / 4 = <<424/4=106>>106
#### 106

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 420, not 424. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
